[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@threebird/controls](./controls.md) &gt; [ScrollAdaptorProps](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.md)

## ScrollAdaptorProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [ScrollAdaptor](./controls.scrolladaptor.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScrollAdaptorProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buffer?](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.buffer.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Buffer before and after element to start registering scroll. Number between 0 and 1, defaults to 0.1 |
|  [dampingFactor?](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.dampingfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5 |
|  [endOffset?](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.endoffset.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Offset to end registering scroll, in px or vh. Default ends when bottom of element is at top of viewport. |
|  [scrollElement](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.scrollelement.md) | HTMLElement | Long DOM Element to observe |
|  [startOffset?](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.startoffset.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Offset to start registering scroll, in px or vh. Default starts when top of element is at bottom of viewport. |
